        Returns the armed state of the hero
        Returns:
        - true=hero armed, false=hero unarmed

      • moveHero

        public void moveHero(char playerInput,
                     Board board,
                     int level)
        Moves the hero according the the user input. Checks if the hero catches the club or key/lever
        Parameters:
        playerInput - - char associated with the user input
        board - - Board object
        level - - current level

      • catchKey

        public boolean catchKey(Board board,
                        int level)
        Checks if the hero catches the key. If he gets the key, his letter is updated
        Parameters:
        board - - Board object
        level - - current level
        Returns:
        true=has the key, false=doesn't have the key
